roleset.name: handle roughly
roleset.note: MANHANDLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'manhandle' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from manhandle.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: words fail me
example.text: The owner, who begs anonymity, asserts that the dwarf, appearing as a dark shadow, has manhandled her, tossing her around the living room and yanking out a hank of hair.
example.arg: tossing her around the living room and yanking out a hank of hair
